newsitem.title: USA: DQE Inc and SatCon to form partnership.
newsitem.headline: DQE Inc and SatCon to form partnership.

text.p: SatCon Technology Corp said Wednesday that DQE Inc unit Duquesne Enterprises will invest $5.0 million to form a strategic partnership to manufacture and distribute SatCon's flywheel energy storage system.
The strategic partnership, Beacon Power Corp, will be a wholly owned subsidiary of SatCon Technology.

In exchange for the investment, Duquesne Enterprises will receive $5.0 million in SatCon common stock based on the average closing price over the last 30 trading days, or approximately 800,000 shares, SatCon said.

Satcon said Duquesne has also agreed to actively participate in developing new business for SatCon's flywheel energy storage systems and distribute SatCon's energy products in seven mid-Atlantic states and the District of Columbia.

"We are enthusiastic about the market potential for flywheel energy storage systems and believe that our strategic partnership with SatCon aligns us with the leading developer of such systems," Duquesne president Thomas Hurkmans said.
SatCon will appoint a Duquesne Enterprises representative to SatCon's Board of Directors.
